other_tests.findings: Moderate intra and extrahepatic biliary dilation, increased from prior exam; common bile duct measures up to 12 mm, more pronounced than on the prior study; bowel wall thickening with associated pericolonic stranding involving the sigmoid colon, most likely compatible with acute diverticulitis; a small 1.2 cm hypodense fluid collection concerning for a small abscess.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The common bile duct dilation is somewhat increased from prior exam.
